title: Trying to extract data deep buried in page HTML, VBA
body:
I have a problem with extracting some crucial data from my company page. As I cannot paste a whole source code of the page I will try to explain my problem the best as I can. I have tried many thing to get data I need however I still cannot dig as deep as I need. I dont know how to explain but using Firefox Developer tools I found structure map like that:
html..firefox.firefox54.win32 >> body.navigator.no-footer >> div#windowshade.windowshade.search >> div.windowshade-body >> iframe#windowShadeFrame >> html..firefox.firefox54.win32 >> body.dialog.navigator >> form#full_search >> div#pageContentDiv >> div#windowshade-content.windowshade-content form >> div#bd >> iframe#structure_browser >> html..firefox.firefox54.win32 >> body.structure-browser >> form >> div#mx_divBody >> div#mx_divTree >> div#mx_divTreeBody >> table#treeBodyTable >> tbody

In the tbody there are information I am interested in. Is it possible to extract that kind of data? Is it even possible to do with vba?
